About

By having helped one of my friends to set up a personal webside, I found it’s interesting and decided to use GitHub Pages to host my own site. That way I wouldn’t have to buy a domain and a server and could write my own blog.

While doing some research up on GitHub Pages, I accidentally chanced upon this simple, blog-aware, static site generator called Jekyll which works really well with GitHub Pages. I figured it would do just fine for my blog and I set about searching for a pretty theme. I wanted a theme with a book-ish vibe. Eventually, With the help of the theme Tale, I was able to build my blog.

Contribute

Feel free to create an issue or make a pull request on GitHub.

Thanks for reading!
